chapters.title: Chapter 22: Out of the Stone
chapters.info: Jain Farstrider, p. 353 (313)—Hero of a favorite book of the Emond's Fielders, The Travels of Jain Farstrider. He traveled all over the world, from the Aiel Waste to the Aryth Ocean, from the Sea of Storms to the Great Blight, on his horse Jeade'en. Rand used this name for his horse as well.
